record.condition: not (same(phaseName in $L.wfPhase, "Resolution")) or phaseName in $L.wfPhase="Resolution" and not (same(rcStatus in $L.file, "Deferred"))
record.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Resolution</Value></condition><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Resolution</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">rcStatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Deferred</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
record.conditionDesc: ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase != "Resolution" OR ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase = "Resolution" AND Status in CurrentRecord != "Deferred"))
